mapper.select: SELECT P.IDX, P.SELER_PROD_CD, P.UPLOAD_PATH, P.NAME, P.CTENT, P.PRC, P.DSPLY_STATE_CD, P.ASCR, D.REG_STATE_CD FROM PRODUCT AS P INNER JOIN PROD_DTL D ON P.IDX = D.PROD_IDX AND P.SELER_IDX = #{seler_idx};

SELECT P.NAME, P.UPLOAD_PATH, P.PRC, (select count(*) from prod_late WHERE PROD_IDX = P.IDX) as 'review_cnt', S.CPNM FROM PRODUCT AS P INNER JOIN PROD_DTL D ON P.IDX = D.PROD_IDX AND D.REG_STATE_CD = 2 AND P.DSPLY_STATE_CD = 1 AND D.STATE_CD = 1 INNER JOIN SELER S ON S.IDX = P.SELER_IDX AND (P.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR P.CTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) GROUP BY PROD_IDX;
